About Us

Farm to Door was created to bridge the gap between you and the farmers in Whatcom County. Located in Bellingham, Washington, we aim to provide you with the freshest produce and farmers with a direct customer base. Order fruits and vegetables when they are in season and have them delivered to your door within hours, or subscribe to produce of your choice and have it delivered to you regularly.

Contact us

Email: contact@farmtodoor.com

Phone: (360) 555-1234

Zip codes we ship to

  • 98226
  • 98229
  • 98248
